DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety ONO-8025 ( KRP-197 ) patient overactive bladder .
DOC.brief_title: Controlled Study ONO-8025 ( KRP-197 ) Patients With Overactive Bladder Japan
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients 20 year old overactive bladder 2 . Total number urinary incontinence episode per week 5 3 . Mean number micturition per day 8 4 . Mean number urinary urgency episode per day 1 5 . Other inclusion criterion specify study protocol 1 . Patients genuine stress incontinence 2 . Patients suffer complication bladder tumor , bladder stone urinary tract infection 3 . Patients undergone surgical operation urinary and/or genital organ within 6 month prior study 4 . Patients suffer complication anticholinergic contraindicate 5 . Other exclusion criterion specify study protocol
